hyp: 文 1 : Still, we'll talk about MIFF next time (now, I’ll just complain that this year, the minds of organizers definitively established in the inexplicable idea that the happy owners of purchased tickets are many times more important for the festival than the accredited guests — a ridiculous and quite offensive principle which no normal world film festival lapses into); and in this issue, we report the events seen by us in Cannes and at "Kinotavr".
